items.name: Nights into Dreams Wiki
items.title: Nights into Dreams Wiki
items.headline: Welcome to the Nights Wiki!
items.desc: NiGHTS into Dreams (or Nights into Dreams), is a video game released by Sega in 1996 for the Sega Saturn video game system. The game's story follows two children entering a dream world, where they are aided by a being called NiGHTS. This Wiki focuses on the the games and the characters of the NiGHTS universe, please contribute if you have something to add!
